Articles.Content: Pretty simple question. Any way to see the commnet as it was in KSP. Or any one planning on adding a early mod. Im addicted to having orbiting satellites but I want to see my work is worth it.

CommNet is a planned feature, it's just not implemented yet.

Personally, I've always preferred RemoteTech, so I'm hoping for a KSP2 version of that sooner rather than later.
